title: SEEKERS OF YOUR HEART
bible_ref: I keep asking God that you may know Him better. Ephesians 1:17
verses: Lord, we want to know you,=Live our lives to show You=All the love we owe You=We're seekers of Your heart,=Seekers of Your heart.
chorus: Text: Melodie Tunney, Dick Tunney, Beverly Darnall;    ISAAC=Music: Melodie Tunney, Dick Tunney, Beverly Darnall; Irregular
